profile_positions.description:
Pricing Strategy, Price Adjustments
Master Data Management

Automation
Project Management
SQL
Python

Roadmap Management

profile_positions.title: MDM and Pricing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leading team of 7 people in 2 locations in Europe (Netherlands, Czechia).
Focusing on pricing strategy, sales drivers, simplyfying, automatization and creating value by being more productive.

I believe that being trustworthy, helpful leader for my team is the key.

For monitoring competition we use information from market attained by crawling or API.
For with data management we use SQL, for data analysis is python more handy. All these ingredients are then visualized in Kibana.

For understanding the needs and prioritizing the requests I start with Why.
For capacity planning we plan in JIRA using Kanban board.
For sharing knowledge we use Confluence.
To keep myself organized I plan/review/learn with Bullet Journal.
profile_positions.title: Pricing & Costing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working in Fabory has enlarged my knowledge about MS SQL server and SQL scripting language as well.

I used to take care of daily load of the data from SAP to SQL database. This experience learnt me how data can be transmitted, how servers communicate, where issues happen and when they happen how to handle them. 

Great part of my work consists of working on new pricelists for high turnover customers in most of European subsidiaries. Here I have to apply statistical knowledge, advanced SQL skills, write quries in Python and its libraries (in Jupyter) and last but not least negotiate terms and prices with sales directors and sales people.

I have become partner (Project manager) for France, Hungary and Romania. In all countries I work on diverse projects that help to improve margin and improve pricing.

Thanks to this job I have learnt to work in SAP that nowadays I use it on daily basis.
profile_positions.title: Pricing Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
This job made me SQL analyst.

I am able to write optimized fast scripts (and procedures) in Oracle PL/SQL that do what they should. For better visualization of data I can write code in VBA or set graphs and tables in Excel to provide immediate information.

I have conquered and won some battles with unstructured data as well.

Thanks to opportunities I became sort of "Business analyst" combined with "Tester" that provide contact among business and IT department, contributed on creation of logical mapping scripts on DWH and also could test it before the actual release on production. 

I have started this job as an intern without any knowledge of SQL, after a couple of months I was offered a full time job. After another couple of months I started to mentor newbies.

I can make Excel files with connection strings together with detailed analysis of certain problem and make suggestions and improvements.

As a part of this work I travelled to Philippines where I spent 3 months by working on credit segmentation in Collection process.
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Since the third grade of my university degree I worked in PR and Marketing department. I was given many tasks from many different fields. 

I was administator of Facebook fan page of your faculty and I also participated on work on web page. 

My responsibilities included coordinating TopSeC - programme for talented students and coordinating Open days where I acted as a leader as well as a moderator who presented every year in front of 600 people.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant at PR and Marketing department

profile_positions.description:
Since the second year of Masters studies I have been coordinator of Open day of Faculty Economics and Administration Masaryk. 

I coordinated whole event from the beginning to the very end. 
I also worked as presenter - I have very good experience in presenting in front of large groups people (500+).

After 2 successful years on Faculty level I was promoted to the role of the Chief Coordinator. For 6 months I had to manage 11 people, solve problems and deliver everything on time. My efforts resulted in Open Day event 17th September 2015.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator of Open Days

profile_positions.description: Processing accountancy, communication with clients in Pohoda SQL software programme. This job gave me a lot o responsibility for my actions.
profile_positions.title: Junior Accountant

profile_positions.description: Financial analysist of Core international s.r.o., I analysed revenues from advertising and then I gave recommendations for future actions.
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst

profile_positions.description: I worked as in Intern in Česká pojišťovna at HR and Quality departments. I have learned many things from Quality department.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
I worked as Project Manager in travel agency. 
I created a Fan page of company, I have written on blog that I made and together with a company we have improved our web page.
profile_positions.title: Project manager

profile_positions.description: For a short period I worked as a seller of bank account / savings account in ING Bank. I met with all sorts of clients and had to deal with their problems and needs. It was a precious experience. Unfortunately I did not work there for a long time, because of illness that striked me down.
profile_positions.title: Seller of ING Savings account

profile_positions.description:
My first analytical position was in Infosys BPO in Brno. I was processing databases in Excel by using complicated functions and creating outputs. 
I worked in multinational team and the last 14 days of my 1 month contract I was a leader of two employes from Sweden and Germany.
profile_positions.title: Data entry clerk

volunteer_experiences.description: I was taking care of journalists and media workers. I also had a role in interviews with the best biathlonists.
